name: J'zargo

other_aspects: Loves Risk When It's His Idea

stunts: J'zargo the Magnificent: +2 to Deceive or Rapport when bragging to gain access, attention, or a concession.

Experimental Scrollwork: Once per scene, create a situational aspect related to an improvised spell effect using Lore (success with style grants 2 free invokes, but failure creates a GM-controlled complication aspect).

recruitment_conditions: PC tolerates J'zargo's methods (at least publicly)
bond_benefits: Once per session, J'zargo can 'overclock' a spell: +2 to a single Lore-based magical action, but the GM immediately creates a minor collateral aspect in the scene.

personality_notes.speaking_style: Third-person bravado, theatrical confidence, sly humor
